testcase.name: AddPlayer > calls the handesubmit function with the input value when the form is submitted
AddPlayer > clears the input when the form is submitted
AuthUser component > Link text is "Logout", when isLoggedIn is true
AuthUser component > "Go to register" by default in link, "login" by default in button
AuthUser component > Text is "Go to login" when isLoggedIn is false and Link is clicked once, "register" in button
Logout: Called functions > handleLogout is called when isLoggedIn is true and the logout link is clicked
submit > onLogin is called with username and password when isLogin is true
submit > onRegister is called with username and password when isLogin is false
ListPlayer > renders a list item with the player's id as its id
ListPlayer > displays the player name inside the anchor element
ListPlayer > calls the onClick prop with the player id when the link is clicked
ListPlayer > anchor should be focusable via the keyboard (by pressing the tab key)
ListPlayers > renders a list with id "players-list"
ListPlayers > renders a ListPlayer for each player in the players prop
RequestStatus component > should render the component, inside which is an element with id 'request-status'
RequestStatus component > should render the component with the correct status
SelectedPlayer > displays the selected player information when a player is passed as a prop with correct ui
SelectedPlayer > should not render if selected player is null
SelectedPlayer > calls the handleDelete function with the player id when the delete button is clicked
SelectedPlayer > calls the handleUpdate function with the updated player active state when the update button is clicked
SelectedPlayer > should not call handleUpdate if checkbox is clicked twice (aka player state is not changed)
